00035 #include "btkDTFPImportanceDensity.h"
00036 
00037 
00038 // STL includes
00039 #include "cassert"
00040 #include "cmath"
00041 
00042 // ITK includes
00043 #include "itkDiffusionTensor3D.h"
00044 
00045 // default 0.25
00046 #define Tau 0.25
00047 
00048 
00049 namespace btk
00050 {
00051 
00052 DTFPImportanceDensity::DTFPImportanceDensity(DTFPSignal *model)
00053 {
00054     assert(model);
00055 
00056 
00057     m_model          = model;
00058     m_2PI            = 2.0 * M_PI;
00059     m_log4PI         = std::log(4.0 * M_PI);
00060 }
00061 
00062 Direction DTFPImportanceDensity::computeMeanDirection(Point xk, Direction ukm1)
00063 {
00064     itk::DiffusionTensor3D<Real> tensor = m_model->DiffusionTensorAt(xk);
00065 
00066     itk::FixedArray<Real,3> eigenValues;
00067     itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> eigenVectors;
00068     tensor.ComputeEigenAnalysis(eigenValues,eigenVectors);
00069 //    Pr(eigenValues[0]); Pr(eigenValues[1]); Pr(eigenValues[2]);
00070 //    Pr(eigenVectors(0,0)); Pr(eigenVectors(0,1)); Pr(eigenVectors(0,2));
00071 //    Pr(eigenVectors(1,0)); Pr(eigenVectors(1,1)); Pr(eigenVectors(1,2));
00072 //    Pr(eigenVectors(2,0)); Pr(eigenVectors(2,1)); Pr(eigenVectors(2,2));
00073 
00074     Real cl = (eigenValues[2] - eigenValues[1]) / std::sqrt(eigenValues[2]*eigenValues[2] + eigenValues[1]*eigenValues[1] + eigenValues[0]*eigenValues[0]);
00075 
00076     if(cl > Tau)
00077     {
00078         Vector vkm1     = ukm1.toVector();
00079         Real dotProduct = vkm1.x()*eigenVectors(2,0) + vkm1.y()*eigenVectors(2,1) + vkm1.z()*eigenVectors(2,2);
00080         Real norm       = std::sqrt( (vkm1.x()*vkm1.x() + vkm1.y()*vkm1.y() + vkm1.z()*vkm1.z()) * (eigenVectors(2,0)*eigenVectors(2,0) + eigenVectors(2,1)*eigenVectors(2,1) + eigenVectors(2,2)*eigenVectors(2,2)) );
00081         Real angle      = std::acos(dotProduct/norm);
00082 
00083         if(angle <= M_PI/2.0)
00084             return Vector(eigenVectors(2,0), eigenVectors(2,1), eigenVectors(2,2)).toDirection();
00085         else
00086             return Vector(-eigenVectors(2,0), -eigenVectors(2,1), -eigenVectors(2,2)).toDirection();
00087     }
00088     else // cl <= 0.25
00089     {
00090         return ukm1;
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 Direction DTFPImportanceDensity::simulate(Direction mean, Real kappa)
00095 {
00096     // Sample random scalar
00097     Real y = (Real)std::rand() / (Real)RAND_MAX;
00098     Real w = 1.0/kappa * std::log(std::exp(-kappa) + kappa * 2.0/kappa * std::sinh(kappa) * y);
00099 
00100     // Sample random angle (to get random unit vector)
00101     Real angle = ((Real)std::rand() / (Real)RAND_MAX) * m_2PI;
00102 
00103     // Concatenate to obtain unit vector with vmf distribution with mean = (0,0,1)
00104     Real cst = std::sqrt(1-w*w);
00105     Vector X(cst*std::cos(angle), cst*std::sin(angle), w);
00106 
00107     Real theta, phi;
00108     Vector vmean = mean.toVector();
00109 
00110     // Rotate if necessary
00111     if(!(vmean.x() == 0 && vmean.y() == 0 && vmean.z() == 1)) // mean not (0,0,1)
00112     {
00113         // Rotations from (0,0,1) to mean
00114         Real cosTheta = std::cos(mean.theta());
00115         Real sinTheta = std::sin(mean.theta());
00116         Real cosPhi   = std::cos(mean.phi());
00117         Real sinPhi   = std::sin(mean.phi());
00118 
00119         // Ry(theta)
00120         // | cos(theta)  0  sin(theta)  |   |x|
00121         // |     0       1       0      | . |y|
00122         // |-sin(theta)  0   cos(theta) |   |z|
00123         Vector tmp(
00124                 cosTheta * X.x() + sinTheta * X.z(),
00125                 X.y(),
00126                 -sinTheta * X.x() + cosTheta * X.z()
00127         );
00128 
00129         // Rz(phi)
00130         // | cos(phi)  -sin(phi)  0 |   |x|
00131         // | sin(phi)   cos(phi)  0 | . |y|
00132         // |    0          0      1 |   |z|
00133         Vector tmp2(
00134                 cosPhi * tmp.x() - sinPhi * tmp.y(),
00135                 sinPhi * tmp.x() + cosPhi * tmp.y(),
00136                 tmp.z()
00137         );
00138 
00139         theta = tmp2.toSphericalCoordinates().theta();
00140         phi   = tmp2.toSphericalCoordinates().phi();
00141     }
00142     else // vkm1 is (0,0,1)
00143     {
00144         theta = X.toSphericalCoordinates().theta();
00145         phi   = X.toSphericalCoordinates().phi();
00146     }
00147 
00148     return Direction(theta,phi);
00149 }
00150 
00151 Real DTFPImportanceDensity::compute(Direction uk, Direction mean, Real kappa)
00152 {
00153     Vector vk   = uk.toVector();
00154     Vector vmean = mean.toVector();
00155 
00156     return std::log(kappa) - m_log4PI - std::log(std::sinh(kappa)) + kappa * (vk.x()*vmean.x() + vk.y()*vmean.y() + vk.z()*vmean.z());
00157 }
00158 
00159 Real DTFPImportanceDensity::computeConcentration(Direction mu, Point xk)
00160 {
00161     itk::DiffusionTensor3D<Real> tensor = m_model->DiffusionTensorAt(xk);
00162 
00163     itk::FixedArray<Real,3> eigenValues;
00164     tensor.ComputeEigenValues(eigenValues);
00165 //    Pr(eigenValues[0]); Pr(eigenValues[1]); Pr(eigenValues[2]);
00166 
00167     Real cl = (eigenValues[2] - eigenValues[1]) / std::sqrt(eigenValues[2]*eigenValues[2] + eigenValues[1]*eigenValues[1] + eigenValues[0]*eigenValues[0]);
00168 
00169     if(cl > Tau)
00170     {
00171         Real alpha = 15;
00172         Real gamma = 0.42;
00173         Real FA    = tensor.GetFractionalAnisotropy();
00174         Real expon = FA/gamma;
00175 
00176         return alpha + std::exp(expon*expon);
00177     }
00178     else // cl <= Tau
00179     {
00180         return 30;
00181     }
00182 }
